mention.text: the USS Vincennes in the Persian Gulf
`` no good reason '' for shooting down an Iranian civilian airliner , killing all 290 aboard
The unusually candid article by Cmdr. David R. Carlson in the U.S. Naval Institute Proceedings magazine this month
the U.S. Naval Institute Proceedings magazine
Carlson , commander of the USS Sides , a frigate that was on the scene when the USS Vincennes shot down the Airbus on July 3 , 1988
commander of the USS Sides , a frigate that was on the scene when the USS Vincennes shot down the Airbus on July 3 , 1988
actions taken by the ship and disputed any notion of self-defense
skipper of the Vincennes at the time
a forum for people to express personal opinions and assertions in various articles related to Navy issues
Commander Carlson 's comments in the magazine article
his personal opinions of the Airbus incident
Navy spokesman David L. Dillon in San Diego
a private self-supported non-profit professional society
